description: Enterprise techniques used by Power Loader, ATT&CK software S0177 (v1.0)
name: Power Loader (S0177)

techniques.comment: [Power Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0177) overwrites Explorer’s Shell_TrayWnd extra window memory to redirect execution to a NTDLL function that is abused to assemble and execute a return-oriented programming (ROP) chain and create a malicious thread within Explorer.exe.(Citation: MalwareTech Power Loader Aug 2013)(Citation: WeLiveSecurity Gapz and Redyms Mar 2013)
